#include<iostream>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
long long power(long long b,long long p){
	long long t1=1;
	while(p){
		if((p%2)==1){
			t1=(t1*b)%mod;
		}
		b=(b*b)%mod;
		p/=2;
	}
	return (t1%mod);
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1){
			cout<<m<<endl;
		}else{
			long long cnt=(m*(m-1))%mod;
			//cout<<"base="<<m-2<<" exponent="<<n-2<<" "<<power(m-2,n-2)<<endl;
			cnt*=power(m-2,n-2);
			cout<<cnt%mod<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
